messages.subject: Free 1:1 Claude Code

lastMessageText:
Hi Carys,
We are an MCP gateway startup helping you quickly gather context into Claude Code. And we've found that the biggest bottleneck for people to even try out our gateway is actually getting people to see the value of Claude Code.

To address this, we're offering free 1:1 sessions to help people:
1) Install Claude Code
2) Complete basic setup in terminal/cursor
3) Clone our open-source GTM Claude Code repo to get started

We've already offered these tutorial sessions to GTM engineers like Jordan Crawford, Jeremy Ross, and Steven Brady. Would you be interested in having a 30-minute call to learn Claude Code?

You can also take a look at our repo here: https://github.com/datagendev/context-foundation


Yu-Sheng Kuo

correspondentProfile.headline: Sales & Marketing Operations Manager
correspondentProfile.about:
A data, process and insight-driven sales and marketing operations manager with nearly 20 years hands-on experience designing and managing lead to order processes for B2B SaaS software businesses.  With 3 Salesforce.com certifications and 2 x Trailhead Ranger status, I am experienced in driving operational excellence across a wide variety of sales & marketing tools and systems.

For the past 4 years, I have exchanged sales and marketing operations to project manage a team of builders, carpenters, plumbers and electricians to redevelop our family home near Marlborough. I have kept up to date with marketing and sales trends and technologies, including legislation and Salesforce certifications. I am currently studying towards my Salesforce Platform App Builder, Certified HubSpot Consultant and have enrolled on the London School of Economics Data Analysis for Management course.. When not working, I enjoy cooking, finding new and exciting instructors on my Peloton bike and walking our Pomsky dogs across the Marlborough Downs.

PERSONAL ATTRIBUTES

Operational Excellence:  Track record in the design, configuration and management of sales & marketing systems and processes to drive growth, exploit opportunities and solve problems.

Data-passion: Drive to bring data to life and paint an accurate picture of the truth and reveal insights.

Process-driven: Design and configure agile and effective lead flow and pipeline management to provide insight and control.

Accuracy-pursuit: A relentless drive to acquire and interrogate data and processes to provide the correct answers to problems, processes, and opportunities.

PROVEN EXPERTISE

CRM Implementation ‚Ä¢ CRM Administration ‚Ä¢ Lead Flow and Pipeline Process Design and Implementation ‚Ä¢  KPI-Driven, Full Funnel Reporting and Dashboarding ‚Ä¢  Data Acquisition and Growth ‚Ä¢Data Analysis ‚Ä¢ Data and Process Compliance ‚Ä¢ Marketing ROI, Budget Management and Forecasting ‚Ä¢ Project Management ‚Ä¢ Market Research Demand Generation Programmes‚Ä¢Event Management ‚Ä¢ Telemarketing ‚Ä¢ SaaS Technology Provider Experience

correspondentProfile.headline: GTM & RevOps System Architect @ TAM Acceleration | The future lies in human and Ai collaboration, not replacement.
correspondentProfile.about:
When I first read about the ‚ÄúInternet of value‚Äù...I could tell...I'm going to fall down this rabbit hole.

Let me explain...

I was 4 years into my first e-commerce start-up.

A multi-restaurant delivery service. We launched in the early days of Facebook.

We were acquiring customers the old-fashioned way‚Ä¶Door-to-door, emailed brochures, and a website that eventually got an upgrade to online ordering.

This was the Internet of Communication‚Ä¶

This meant our cost of operations and customer acquisition was high. App-based business models entered the market and we could not scale fast enough to compete.

So...we failed...

I learned about inbound marketing and applied it to the next business in retail.

To build awareness and acquire customers we focused on brand marketing, storytelling, and community building ‚Äì primarily through digital media and events.

The internet of information...

Educate and inform, then engage and expand.

We grew faster than our physical operations could handle, and scaling a physical business was too capital intensive.

So...we stalled...

Next I started to work on digital products ‚Äì a start-up building a Saas-enabled Marketplace for the retail sector.

This time we faced a completely new challenge to scale.

Payments...

As a US-based company, operating in Asia we quickly learned how tedious, time-consuming, and expensive it would be to scale our product regionally due to the highly regulated payment systems available.

So we pivoted and focused on one thing that we could be great at.

But my curiosity peaked.

I knew I could no longer ignore blockchain technology because I realized that things were changing‚Ä¶. quickly.

I believe we deserve an internet where value can be freely and securely exchanged with anyone, anywhere in the world, at any time.

This is the beginning. An exciting new frontier.

The Internet of Value.

If you‚Äôre interested to learn more about what we‚Äôre building at FNDZ email me‚Ä¶

marco@fndz.io

correspondentProfile.about:
Now that you're here, I want to ask you:

üî¥ Are you frustrated for not reaching even closer to the number of sales you expected to hit by the end of this month?

üî¥ Are you tired, because your target audience isn't converting into your loyal customers?

üî¥ Are you overwhelmed by the lack of responses you recieve for your product or your website?

Okay, relax now..

There's is nothing to worry about.

But there's a little need to worry about it..

There might be any of the following reasons that isn't converting your prospects into deadly customers..

üö´you haven't targeted an audience yet.
üö´ you're not addressing properly to your target audience.
üö´your offer isn't clear to your prospects
üö´your way of approach to attract audience isn't right
üö´your content is generic rather than specific.
üö´your CTA isnt clear

If you're committing any of these mistakes( read: crime), worry not..
..I got you covered.

A well trained copywriter who offers copywriting services to:

startups, business owners, coaches and consultants...

üî•Landing page
üî•Website copy


If you're ready to handle the crazy boost in your sales üí∞üí∞üí∞ feel free to slide in my DMs.

Until next time.
Houria A.

We are working on an MCP gateway that gives Claude tools to see your inventory, audiences, and results across whatever you already use for screens, CRM, and measurement, so a planner can ask ‚Äúwhere should we put the next EV budget for this audience in Salt Lake‚Äù and get a package with the supporting data instead of juggling multiple dashboards. You keep the same OOH stack and sales process, and the gateway simply turns it into a single, inspectable surface your team can query from Claude.

If this sounds useful, we can walk through which MCP connectors would actually help Universal and help you get them set up inside one gateway tool.

Best,
Yusheng

correspondentProfile.headline: CEO & Co-Founder @ Universal Media + Universal EVX | 35+ Years in Transforming Out-of-Home (OOH) & Digital (DOOH) Advertising | Innovator in Retail & Mobility Media
correspondentProfile.location: Salt Lake City, Utah, United States
correspondentProfile.about:
As a seasoned internet and media executive with over 25 years of experience, I have a track record of transforming innovative ideas into thriving digital businesses. As CEO and Co-Founder of Universal Media, I have steered one of the leading companies in the Out of Home Media industry, specializing in retail, digital out-of-home, and place-based media advertising.

My career is marked by the initiation of groundbreaking platforms, including the first white-label social networking platform in the US and the first social commerce platform in LATAM. These ventures have established me as a respected leader in the digital industry.

At present, I am leading the digital and mobility expansion of Universal Media, harnessing the power of advertising and brand sponsorships to finance cutting-edge digital and mobility infrastructure and services. This initiative demonstrates my dedication to pioneering business models that seamlessly blend technology, advertising, and public service.

With a wide-ranging expertise spanning digital and out-of-home advertising, social networking, social media, digital strategy, and business development, I excel in implementing new technologies and initiatives across businesses, guiding companies through the nuances of the digital landscape.

In addition to my executive roles, I share my insights and expertise through speaking engagements and thought leadership on topics such as EV, OOH, media, technology, and advertising. I am always open to connecting with other professionals who are passionate about these areas.

messages.subject: Turn your OOH stack into Claude tools

lastMessageText:
Hi Ivan,
Saw your posts on MCPs you‚Äôve wired into Claude. We‚Äôre working on an MCP gateway that gives you a single tool in Claude to reach all of that, so when you ask ‚Äúplan Christmas ops‚Äù, ‚Äúspin up an influencer push‚Äù, or ‚Äúwhat‚Äôs changing in the pet market?‚Äù, Claude can use one surface to fan out to the right MCPs and compose an answer, instead of you hard‚Äëwiring each and suffer context bloat.¬†

We are super early, and would love to learn more of usage pattern from leader and early endeavor like you!¬†

Best,
Yusheng

correspondentProfile.headline: Founder & Chief Digital Officer @ Years.com

messages.subject: One surface for your 8‚ÄëMCP stack

lastMessageText:
Hi Ian,
We‚Äôre working on an MCP gateway that gives Claude one place to reach the systems you already use for that work (HubSpot, enrichment, warehouse, docs), so when you sketch ‚Äúrun the standard onboarding audit for this portal‚Äù or ‚Äúdraft a revenue blueprint for this client‚Äù in plain language, it can actually pull the right history, surface issues, and write the draft audit/blueprint into your repo. 

We are curious whether that kind of ‚Äúone gateway, many services‚Äù layer lines up with how you‚Äôd like your revenue architecture practice to run, or if you‚Äôd approach it differently.¬†

Best,
Yusheng

lastMessageText:
Dear Yu-Sheng Kuo,
I am Hongjian Liu, General Manager of the Suzhou Huidy Overseas Innovation&Entrepreneurship Talent Connection Center, a government-funded official platform under the jurisdiction of Jiangsu Province, China. Our mission is to recruit high-level overseas talents for Jiangsu Province, providing fully free professional services.

Are you seeking earning money from/in China(including full-time/part-time employment, onsite/online work,entrepreneurship opportunities, High-level talent qualification recognition bonus), or nationally certified high-level talent credentials in China? The Chinese government has initiated a National Overseas High-Level Talent Recruitment Program to strengthen collaborations between Chinese enterprises, universities, research institutions, and global experts. This program focuses on introducing doctoral talents from various backgrounds working overseas to work in China.

We invite distinguished talents like yourself to contribute to scientific research, technological innovation, and entrepreneurship in China. Participants will gain access to policy support for national talent applications and subsidies exceeding 10 million RMB, covering research funding and living allowances.
Requirements:
Minimum 2 years of working experience after graduation.
Holding a Doctor Degree.

To receive confidential program details (disclosed via voice communication), please provide your WeChat ID and updated CV.

If uninterested, kindly decline this invitation to assist our records. Recommendations of qualified candidates are welcome.

Best regards,

ÂàòÊ¥™Ââë
Suzhou HUIDY Overseas Innovation and Entrepreneurship Talent Service Platform- General Manager

messages.subject: Official Letter Welcoming High-level Talents of All Nationalities to China

lastMessageText:
Hi Yu-Sheng ,

How are you?

I wanted to reach out with an exciting opportunity at Foresight Data Machines (FDM), a fast-growing AI startup revolutionising one of the world‚Äôs most carbon-intensive industries: steelmaking. FDM built ScrapChef, a product that combines advanced AI with physics and is helping steel producers cut emissions, improve quality, and dramatically reduce costs.

They‚Äôve raised $10.7M earlier this year, opened a second office in Austin, Texas (HQ in London), and are now hiring Forward Deployed Engineers to join their growing team. This role is ideal for hands-on engineers who love solving real-world problems, working close to the action, and don‚Äôt mind some travel to US client sites.

Some of the team includes:
Tom, Harry, Jacques, Conor, Jiri & Jonny.

Would you be open to a quick chat to explore further?

Best
Sean Rozen
Founder | ByteSearch
